profile.name: Victor Melo
profile.title: SWE at Google
profile.bio: I'm a Software Engineer with a passion for building scalable systems and a deep interest in applying machine learning to enhance software development. With experience at Google and AWS, I've honed my skills in full-stack development using Angular, Golang, Python, and TypeScript. I'm driven by a desire to automate processes, build impactful features, and collaborate with talented teams to create innovative solutions.

projects.title: Time is Money Calculator
projects.description: A published iOS app that converts the cost of items from currency to time, based on a user's work schedule and monthly income. It simplifies financial perspective.

projects.title: Video Filters with Swift + OpenCV
projects.description: An academic project integrating OpenCV with Swift to apply various video filters using matrix transformations. This project highlights computer vision and algorithm implementation.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe! Humanity VS. AI
projects.description: An interactive Tic Tac Toe game that uses the BFS algorithm to power its AI. It was a top 300 submission for the Apple WWDC 2020 student scholarship.

projects.title: Apple Watch Breath Replica
projects.description: My implementation of the Apple Watch's 'Breathe' animation in SwiftUI, demonstrating skill in creating complex, fluid user interface animations.

projects.title: Personal Website 2024
projects.description: A static website built with React, TypeScript, and Material-UI. It's hosted for free using GitHub Pages, showcasing my front-end development skills.
